about.title: Hey there! I'm Ziqiang
about.intro1: I am a full-stack web developer with 9 years of development experience and I currently reside in Hangzhou.
about.intro2: Has led the architecture design and development of Billion-Scale Traffic Systems(Taobao 11-11 Festival), and is proficient in performance optimization.
about.intro3: In recent years, I have fully embraced the technological wave of AI, from personal assistants and programming assistance, to projects such as‘AI models & virtual fitting’.
about.intro4: I enjoy exploring new things and relishing the process of solving problems. In my spare time, I like going hiking outdoors, cycling, and shooting. Welcome to communicate.
about.urbanicDescription: Responsible for cross-border e-commerce App products, including mobile, PC, and CRM backends. Using React, Typescript, Next.js, Ant Design and other technology stacks. Promoting the research and application of AI models in cross-border e-commerce, implementing 'AI Model & Virtual Fitting' projects.
about.xiaohongshuDescription: Responsible for enterprise efficiency department SaaS product development. Breaking down information silos and improving office efficiency through information aggregation and process engines. Introduced LRU/OT collaborative algorithms to solve performance bottleneck issues.
about.alibabaDescription: Participated in the design of Alibaba Double 11 page building system, including page building, data delivery, and traffic monitoring. As a cornerstone system, it handled billions of traffic from 2017-2020 Double 11. Later responsible for Taobao's digital operation quick-build project, saving more than 5 million in costs.
about.dingdingDescription: An industry-leading project management product. I was responsible for the system design and Node.js service development of the enterprise version business, including project management, task management, document management, and other functions.
about.universityName: East China University of Science and Technology
about.universityDescription: Bachelor of Science, Top-tier Chinese University (985/211)
